betterquesting:10.desc:8:
The §6Draconic Reactor Core§r is a reactor that emits §emassive amounts of energy§r.

To make the Draconic Reactor Core in fusion crafting, you will need §a§rtwo §6Awakened Core§e§rs and two §6Awakened Draconium Ingot§e§rs on both sides§r, and a §6Chaos Shard§r in the §6Fusion Crafting Core§r.

To make the §6Reactor Stabilizer§r in fusion crafting, you will need one §6Reactor Stabilizer Rotor Assembly§r, a §6Chaotic Core§r, and two Awakened Draconium Ingots on the left column, and a §6Reactor Stabilizer Focus Ring§r, a §6Draconic Energy Core§r, and two Awakened Draconium Ingots on the right side, with a §6Reactor Stabilizer Frame§r in the Fusion Crafting Core.

To make a Reactor Energy Injector in fusion crafting, you will need two §6Draconium Ingot§rs, two §6Iron Ingot§rs, and a §6Reactor Stabilizer Inner Rotor§r on the left column, and three Reactor Stabilizer Inner Rotors and two Draconium Ingots on the right column, with a §6Wyvern Core§r in the Fusion Crafting Core.
